mapper.select: select seq, time_wakeup,time_sleep, comment, uid from daily_log where DATE_FORMAT(time_wakeup,'%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval 1 month), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(time_wakeup,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m'),'01'), '%Y%m%d') AND time_wakeup <> time_sleep AND uid = #{uid} order by time_wakeup
SELECT seq, time_wakeup,time_sleep, COMMENT, uid FROM daily_log WHERE time_wakeup = time_sleep AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into daily_log (time_wakeup, comment, uid) values(now(),#{comment}, #{uid})
mapper.delete: delete from daily_log where seq = #{seq} AND uid = #{uid}
